body.name: TRESemmé Ultra Keratin Smooth Concentrate Conditioner For Dry Hair Salon Smooth in 30 Seconds, Fast-Detangle Technology and 2X More Washes 20 oz
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 20% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
features: SALON SMOOTH: TRESemmé Ultra Keratin Smooth Concentrate Shampoo and Conditioner deliver the ultimate salon smoothness and shine in just 30 seconds...
FAST-DETANGLE TECHNOLOGY: This ultra-fast detangle concentrated hair conditioner formula efficiently penetrates hair strands and delivers salon smoothness to transform dry hair
ULTRA-CONCENTRATE CONDITIONER: This dry hair conditioner contains 100 percent more Keratin Smoothing Actives per concentrate drop and uses less plastic per wash (vs. non-concentrated Keratin Smooth)
TRUSTED INGREDIENTS: This deep conditioner for dry hair is PETA-approved and is free from Parabens, Dyes, Mineral Oil, and DMDM Hydantoin
HAIR CARE TIPS FROM OUR STYLISTS: After shampooing, squeeze ONLY HALF of your usual dose (yes, that’s enough) and massage the gel-like conditioner as usual in wet hair
body.description: There’s something about silky hair that’s full of natural movement that lets you take on the day with confidence. You can now get that style without having to go to a salon with TRESemmé Ultra Keratin Smooth Concentrate Shampoo and Conditioner. This concentrated conditioner delivers the ultimate salon smoothness and shine in just 30 seconds. Using only half your usual dose, this ultra-fast detangle concentrated hair conditioner formula penetrates hair strands and delivers salon smoothness and shine in just 30 seconds. The dry hair conditioner detangles knots and adds softness to make it easy to achieve covetable, confident hair, no matter your hair type or hair need. The end result? Gorgeously silky hair that lasts and lasts. This conditioner for dry hair contains 2X the Keratin Smoothing Actives per concentrate drop, provides 2X more washes and uses less plastic per wash. How to use the Ultra Keratin Smooth Concentrate System: Step 1: Squeeze ONLY HALF of your usual dose (yes, that's enough) and massage the gel-like smoothing shampoo in wet hair. Step 2: After shampooing, squeeze ONLY HALF of your usual dose (yes, that’s enough) and massage the gel-like conditioner as usual in wet hair. Step 3: Finish and style with your favorite TRESemmé products. This TRESemmé deep conditioner is free from Parabens, Dyes, Mineral Oil, and DMDM Hydantoin. We've always understood that style is more than a look, it's a powerful tool to help you achieve your dreams. With our professional quality care, a world of style possibilities is yours to achieve. Every choice we make at TRESemmé, from the values we promote—such as not testing on animals and being PETA-approved—to the carefully selected ingredients we use, are made to give you professional salon quality haircare products you can trust. Because 70 years on, we believe in the power of style. So tell your story, make your mark – and achieve your aspirations with confidence. With TRESemmé, you can DO IT WITH STYLE.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TRESemmé Ultra Keratin Smooth Concentrate Conditioner, with Fast-Detangle technology, delivers salon-level smoothness and shine in 30 seconds and transforms frizzy hair. This ultra conditioner delivers 2X more washes* and contains 2X the keratin smoothing actives per concentrated drop. *versus non-concentrated Keratin Smooth 20 oz

Fast-Detangle Technology Our new Ultra Fast-Detangle Concentrated Formula efficiently penetrates hair strands and delivers the ultimate salon smoothness and shine in just 30 seconds. 50% Less Plastic This concentrated conditioner delivers 2X more washes*, using less plastic per wash. For All Hair Types This anti-frizz conditioner can be used to smooth all hair types. Squeeze 1/2 the Amount This conditioner is so potent that you only need to use half your usual dose.

TRESemmé Ultra Keratin Smooth Concentrate Shampoo, 20 oz TRESemmé Ultra Keratin Repair Concentrate Shampoo, 20 oz TRESemmé Ultra Keratin Repair Concentrate Conditioner, 20 oz Main Benefit Delivering 2X more washes, this Ultra Keratin Smooth Concentrate Shampoo with Fast-Lather Technology efficiently penetrates hair strands and delivers salon smoothness and shine in just 30 seconds. This Ultra Keratin Repair Concentrate Shampoo with Fast-Lather Technology efficiently penetrates hair strands and delivers visible repair, restoring and shielding damaged hair in just 30 seconds. In only 30 seconds, this Ultra Keratin Repair Concentrate Conditioner with Fast-Detangle Technology efficiently penetrates hair strands and delivers visible repair, restoring and shielding damaged hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars i'll update in a few months but one wash in now!
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: i still love and will be using this product but i highly suggest shopping around, as i just saw a bundle pack (shampoo&conditioner) in the BIG bottles (bigger than these) at walmart for only 9.98so far i am liking this set, i also saw a shine mineral oil from this same tresseme keratin line that i picked up at my local grocery store to try and get the full experience. i have long wavy hair with some patches of straight hair, lots of waves and puff (especially after brushing) and a few patches of full coils in the undergrowth on my neck. my hair some days is more straight and others is just a giant poofy mess. i've gone on a hair journey after using tresemme moisture rich shampoo for years. other brands would have some good points but none gave me that same feeling that tresseme does. i was about to go spend 50 dollars on one more 'big brand' to see if it might help with the poof when i saw this line! almost couldnt wait to hop in the shower. used half as the bottle suggests and was able to get all my hair clean just fine. i wasnt sold completely on the smell, it's not bad but it's more chemically than the other shampoo i use by them. but you know what? i walked past my husband and he couldn't stop telling me how good i smell so that was enough for me to get over that lol. my hair wash was last night so i'm on day 2 hair. it feels soft, smooth, and clean. the oil leaves a wonderful healthy shine. i'm curious to see how far i can go between washes, i usually wash every 3 days and even then my hair is just barely starting to get greasy. really hoping this helps smooth out my frizz, i'll update more after having used this for a while, but so far i enjoy it. what girl doesn't like to feel soft?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This better than salon products on my hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft shiny hair.
reviews.reviewText: It’s my first time using this conditioner and I absolutely love it! My hair tends to be quite frizzy and unmanageable at times but after using this conditioner, I let my hair air dry. Next I used the flat iron and noticed how soft, shiny and manageable my hair became. You don’t need to use a lot of this conditioner just like it says on the bottle.Will definitely be purchasing again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this Keratin Smooth conditioner to tame my frizzy dried out hair. I used it as directed for over two weeks. A friend said my hair now looks like I just got thrown out of a fast moving convertible. My hair now looks like a smooth frizzy fright wig found on the side of the road. I play it off, saying the look is intentional. I really expected this product to do wonders, to straighten my hair and make me more attractive when I've never been any of those things. The product works! It make your hair luxurious and smooth, but it does not promise wonders. I'm deducting one star over bitterness at how the universe has cursed me with a fright wig for hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really love this set, it makes my hair super soft. Hardly ever have any tangles and always pass the knot test. When I put my hair up wet and then take it down during the day, I always get compliments on how it smells good. Give a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves hair smooth and sleek, revitalized and awesome-smelling!
reviews.reviewText: I have naturally frizz-prone wavy hair, and this was just what I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A little disappointed
reviews.reviewText: I don’t find this to be anything great. The scent is amazing but it’s just ordinary shampoo and conditioner, at least for me anyway. This is super concentrated and I needed to use the same amount as I normally would. Also note, this stuff is extremely thick and requires a very strong squeeze to get it out. I imagine someone with arthritis, carpal tunnel, etc. would have in incredibly difficult time getting this stuff out of the bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves my hair bouncy
reviews.reviewText: So I started using this shampoo after reading all the good reviews. I do not regret getting this combo. The shampoo smells good, the Conditioner does too. I’ve been using it for almost two months and I noticed a difference on my hair. My hair feels and looks healthier. I have thick, wavy and puffy hair. If that makes sense, my hair is wild. Latina hair! My hair is loving this , it also looks moisturize and shiny. You only need a small amount as well. I am very picky when it comes to hair products. I can happily save that I’ve found my new favorite shampoo and conditioner. Super affordable so it’s a win for me.
